title: Jaylen Brown honors Bill Nye at Hollywood Walk of Fame ceremony
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Boston Celtics "Thank you for changing the world, one dad joke and one science experiment at a time.

AP Photo/Chris Pizzello Longtime TV personality and scientific educator Bill Nye received his own star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame on Monday afternoon.

title: Scott Pioli has a candid take on Rhamondre Stevenson’s future with Patriots
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: New England Patriots "You're either going to learn how to hold onto the football, or someone else is going to have it, or you're going to be somewhere else.
" Rhamondre Stevenson is looking to bounce back after a two-fumble performance on Sunday.

title: Activist Monica Cannon-Grant pleads guilty to federal fraud charges
author: Molly Farrar
bullets: Local News In federal court Monday, Cannon-Grant pleaded guilty to 18 fraud-related charges, including conspiracy to commit wire fraud.
Former Boston community organizer Monica Cannon-Grant plead guilty to federal fraud charges at the John J.
Moakley Federal Courthouse in Boston on Monday.

title: Wu will run unopposed in her reelection bid after challenger’s recount bid falls short
author: The Associated Press
bullets: Local News Wu, a progressive Democrat running for a second term, spent much of the year jousting with the federal government over immigration.
Boston mayoral candidate Josh Kraft listens as Boston Mayor Michelle Wu speaks during a mayoral forum in May.

Mark Stockwell for The Boston Globe BOSTON (AP) — Michelle Wu will run unopposed for mayor in Boston after a challenger didn’t garner enough votes to advance to the general election, the city’s election department announced MondayWu, the city’s first Asian and female leader and a frequent target of the Trump administration, is seeking a second, four-year term.

title: Here are a few possible reasons why the Patriots are showing Rhamondre Stevenson such patience
author: Khari A. Thompson
bullets: New England Patriots Stevenson has eight fumbles over his last 18 games, but the Patriots seem to be sticking with him.
Rhamondre Stevenson Barry Chin/The Boston Globe ShareSend this article to your social connections.

Longtime Patriots coach and executive Bobby Grier dies at 82 Mike Vrabel on Patriots turnovers, a failed fourth down play, and what he said to Julian Edelman CommentaryFOXBOROUGH — Mike Vrabel’s patience with Rhamondre Stevenson doesn’t appear to have worn out yet.

title: ABC ends Jimmy Kimmel’s suspension and his show will return Tuesday
author: The Associated Press
bullets: TV Sinclair said Monday that it would not air Kimmel's show Tuesday and would broadcast news programming instead.
“Discussions with ABC are ongoing as we evaluate the show's potential return,” the company said.
Jimmy Kimmel appears at the Walt Disney Television upfront in New York on May 14, 2019.

title: Trump administration cancels $20M grant for Roxbury street project
author: Beth Treffeisen
bullets: Local News The U.

Department of Transportation cited misalignment with energy priorities as a reason for the cancellation.
